overview:
Co-Founder, Director and VP Sales of www.YUDU.com

A seasoned, experienced, dynamic, respected and well connected professional with over 24 Years experience in key account management and training- from Field to Telephone & e-sales presentations for a wide range of Blue Chip Accounts.

An Expert in Sales Team Recruitment, Management, Training, Development and Motivation, specialising in the Telephone and e-Sales channels, Agents, Partners & Worldwide Distributors.

Goal: To help, enable and empower as many people as possible to successfully launch and deploy Digital Publishing Projects, Editions and Apps that help their companies make and save money.

“If you help enough people get what they want, you can have everything that you want”

To see YUDU.com achive the status of -

NO1 Leading Multi-Platform Publishing Company.

Specialities: Specialist in empowering companies to be able to publish and produce Digital and iPad Editions of Magazines, Newspapers, Catalogs, Catalogues, Brochures, Directories, Reports, Manuals, Books, Newsletters etc.

Consultancy and sales training on how to monetize online digital editions and experienced industry insight presentations.
